title: Former Soviet Spy's Warning for America | Guest: Jack Barsky | 5/9/22
description:
Glenn reads an op-ed from the New York Times regarding the right to have an abortion, and Glenn sets the record straight. Glenn and Stu discuss the radicalism of the pro-abortion side, as the Left accuses the Right of the same. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Jewish leaders claiming that the Torah is pro-choice. Jack Barsky, former Soviet spy and the topic of the podcast “The Agent,” joins Glenn to discuss Russia, Putin, and America slipping into authoritarianism. Glenn and Stu discuss the state of California, its ongoing power struggles, and the benefits of nuclear power. Glenn and Stu discuss the odd number of food processing plant accidents that have occurred recently, involving plane crashes and fires.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
